note:
Profile picture: art of an anthropomorphic green bird with an orange beak. They are wearing a light brown cadet hat and simple black square rimmed eyeglasses. Art by @bestiaexmachina

"Useless eater" queer furry stoner in a suburb city of Portland Oregon, aka stolen land.

I'm a gender-agnostic polyamorous millennial white emo creature navigating life though late-stage capitalism. I like rubbing elbows and learning with communists, anarchists, and other radical left thinkers. I love my VSETT 8 e-scooter. Fuck car dependent cities, I care about places made for people, not cars or capitalists. Also passionate about #ASMR, TCG collecting, #furry art, PC gaming (especially indies), #thrifting, and #Digimon.

-!- May post adult/sex related content, with content warnings. -!-

I only boost image posts with an honest attempt to provide alt-text for those who use screen-readers.
